Specimen Type: Formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tissue blocks or fresh-frozen tissue sections
Purpose: To detect and report ETV6 (12P13.2) gene rearrangements in tissue specimens using fluorescence in situ hybridization (FISH).
Container: FFPE tissue block or cryovial/slide for fresh-frozen tissue
Equipment: Fluorescence microscope, thermocycler, 37 °C incubator, 73 °C water bath
